name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: npm run build-src; npm run build-test; cat output/src/*.js > lib/cuttlebone.js
scripts.build-src: rm -rf      js/*; node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc         --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output src/*.ts
scripts.build-test: rm -rf test/js/*; node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc         --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output test/*.ts
scripts.watch-src: rm -rf      js/*; node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --watch --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output src/*.ts
scripts.watch-test: rm -rf test/js/*; node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --watch --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output test/*.ts
scripts._watch: npm run build; npm run watch-dialog; grunt
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite;
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build; npm run watch

author: Ikagaka
